video.title: The Blacklist
video.synopsis: After turning himself in, a brilliant fugitive offers to help the FBI bag other baddies, but only if rookie profiler Elizabeth Keen is his partner.

episodes.synopsis: A criminal mastermind surrenders to the FBI with a stunning offer to catch an elusive terrorist -- but he'll only talk to a specific rookie profiler.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Liz and Red track an assassin who disguises his kills in large-scale catastrophes. The Department of Justice struggles to understand Red's motives.
episodes.title: The Freelancer (No. 145)

episodes.synopsis: Liz and Red go undercover to take down an assassin who's been decimating the ranks of the CIA. Tom asks Liz about the man who attacked him.
episodes.title: Wujing (No. 84)

episodes.synopsis: When Liz's key witness disappears, Red suspects a killer who literally stews his victims, making them vanish without a trace.
episodes.title: The Stewmaker (No. 161)

episodes.synopsis: A sinister middleman with a unique ability puts the FBI on the trail of a missing NSA analyst.
episodes.title: The Courier (No. 85)

episodes.synopsis: Eager to clear Tom's name, Liz turns him in to the FBI -- but she soon discovers that he's involved with a corporate terrorist.
episodes.title: Gina Zanetakos (No. 152)

episodes.synopsis: Following a chemical attack on the subway, Liz and the team hunt down a mad scientist who used to work for the government.
episodes.title: Frederick Barnes (No. 47)

episodes.synopsis: Red is enlisted to help Liz and the FBI go after an anti-capitalist cabal that's intent on bringing the U.S. economy to its knees.
episodes.title: General Ludd (No. 109)

episodes.synopsis: An assassination attempt on Red brings the FBI under siege. Liz stealthily moves through the building to retake the facility.
episodes.title: Anslo Garrick (No. 16), Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Liz and a mysterious stranger fight to save Red and Ressler from Anslo Garrick and his Wild Bunch gang.
episodes.title: Anslo Garrick (No. 16), Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A serial killer from Liz's past strikes again while Red tenaciously hunts for his betrayer.
episodes.title: The Good Samaritan (No. 106)

episodes.synopsis: The FBI's latest target, known as the Alchemist, protects the guilty by manipulating the DNA of the innocent.
episodes.title: The Alchemist (No. 101)

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of Liz's adoption, Red puts her on the trail of an adoption agency for the wealthy that employs truly evil sourcing methods.
episodes.title: The Cyprus Agency (No. 64)

episodes.synopsis: A femme fatale from Red's past asks for his help in procuring an ancient artifact -- and leads the FBI on a snipe hunt.
episodes.title: Madeline Pratt (No. 73)

episodes.synopsis: The FBI pursues a Blacklister who metes out "justice" for those who are wrongly imprisoned.
episodes.title: The Judge (No. 57)

episodes.synopsis: As a Yakuza crime lord escapes prison and intends to get revenge on Ressler, Tom and Jolene face off.
episodes.title: Mako Tanida (No. 83)

episodes.synopsis: While chasing a cyberterrorist who has the ability to take over any system, Liz investigates Jolene's disappearance.
episodes.title: Ivan (No. 88)

episodes.synopsis: While working to uncover Tom's true identity, Liz searches for a claims adjuster who persuades ordinary people to become contract killers.
episodes.title: Milton Bobbit (No. 135)

episodes.synopsis: As the FBI searches for a Serbian family of kidnappers, Red uses them in a scheme to out Tom -- which leads to a fateful confrontation with Liz.
episodes.title: The Pavlovich Brothers (No. 119-122)

episodes.synopsis: As the FBI pursues a political fixer known as the Kingmaker, Red seeks Fitch's protection against an unknown enemy who's trying to take him down.
episodes.title: The Kingmaker (No. 42)

episodes.synopsis: After discovering the truth behind her father's death, Liz refuses to work with Red just as his situation grows desperate.
episodes.title: Berlin (No. 8)

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of the Russian plane crash, Liz is forced to reunite with Red to track down Berlin.
episodes.title: Berlin (No. 8): Conclusion

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious assassin puts Reddington's ex-wife in danger; Liz deals with the fallout of her showdown with Tom; Cooper returns to the task force.
episodes.title: Lord Baltimore (No. 104)

episodes.synopsis: The task force investigates a strange Warsaw bank robbery; Reddington has a plan to save his ex-wife, while Cooper recruits a new member of the team.
episodes.title: Monarch Douglas Bank (No. 112)

episodes.synopsis: As the task force focuses on a disgraced surgeon running a black market practice, Reddington finds new opportunities; Liz expresses mistrust.
episodes.title: Dr. James Covington (No. 89)

episodes.synopsis: When ordinary people suddenly become killers, Reddington suspects a sinister experiment; Liz goes to Naomi and tries to question her about Red.
episodes.title: Dr. Linus Creel (No. 82)

episodes.synopsis: The task force hunts an eco-terrorist bent on unleashing a deadly virus; Reddington covertly observes Jennifer;  Liz visits a secret basement.
episodes.title: The Front (No. 74)

episodes.synopsis: Liz and Reddington fight wildlife poachers tied to human trafficking. Ressler's addiction begins to cause problems. Liz's hidden secret is revealed.
episodes.title: The Mombasa Cartel (No. 114)

episodes.synopsis: The Task Force focuses on the kidnapping of a nuclear scientist. Intel from Tom helps Liz to arrange a meeting between Berlin and Reddington.
episodes.title: The Scimitar (No. 22)

episodes.synopsis: Reddington and Berlin form an unlikely alliance in Moscow. Liz tries to keep her secret about Tom, while Tom and Reddington keep their own secrets.
episodes.title: The Decembrist (No. 12)

episodes.synopsis: After Reddington is imprisoned in a remote detention center, Liz, Ressler and Samar are sent to extract him. Braxton tells Liz what he knows.
episodes.title: Luther Braxton (No. 21)

episodes.synopsis: Following the prison attack, Cooper sends in a rescue team. Braxton captures Liz and tries to uncover her childhood memories about the fire.
episodes.title: Luther Braxton (No. 21): Conclusion

episodes.synopsis: Liz, Ressler and Reddington work to take down a criminal mastermind who holds several American hostages. A local murder could create problems for Liz.
episodes.title: Ruslan Denisov (No. 67)

episodes.synopsis: The investigation of a polygamous cult leader is tied to illegal weapon sales. Reddington tries to pinpoint the location of Fitch’s mysterious safe.
episodes.title: The Kenyon Family (No. 71)

episodes.synopsis: The Task Force sets its sights on a serial killer who has been hunting down his victims for years. Liz and Red argue over the Fulcrum.
episodes.title: The Deer Hunter (No. 93)

episodes.synopsis: Reddington is kidnapped after telling the FBI about a notorious crime family. Before going undercover, Tom realizes he still has feelings for Liz.
episodes.title: T. Earl King VI (No. 94)

episodes.synopsis: With Liz now facing murder charges for a crime she didn't commit, Reddington takes matters into his own hands and goes to Germany to search for Tom.
episodes.title: The Major (No. 75)

episodes.synopsis: Reddington and Ressler are under pressure to find Tom as evidence mounts against Liz. A serious diagnosis will have ramifications for the Task Force.
episodes.title: Tom Keen (No. 7)

episodes.synopsis: A grim discovery leads Reddington and Liz to a scientist conducting immortality experiments. Tom's feelings for Liz may place them both in danger.
episodes.title: The Longevity Initiative (No. 97)

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious woman who targets wealthy businessmen is sought by the Task Force. A showdown over the Fulcrum ends with unintended consequences.
episodes.title: Vanessa Cruz (No. 117)

episodes.synopsis: As Liz takes charge to save a badly wounded Reddington, Connolly's political moves begin to take shape. Liz confronts Tom about Reddington.
episodes.title: Leonard Caul (No. 62)

episodes.synopsis: While the Task Force investigates a master criminal who smuggles dead bodies, Liz continues to seek the truth about her past. Tom and Liz grow closer.
episodes.title: Quon Zhang (No. 87)

episodes.synopsis: Liz and Ressler go after a Russian assassin targeting a U.S. senator using a new biological weapon. Liz learns some startling news about her mother.
episodes.title: Karakurt (No. 55)

episodes.synopsis: Reddington and Cooper help Liz as she faces a phony assassination charge. Old secrets are revealed as Liz and Reddington come to a crossroads.
episodes.title: Tom Connolly (No. 11)
